text: new subparagraphs solid waste working group duties amend rsa iii by inserting after subparagraph h the following new subparagraphs i review and make recommendations regarding municipal solid waste plans and implementing the prohibition of any landfill in the state from accepting waste from a municipality that does not have a solid waste management plan j review and make recommendations regarding the development of a solid waste disposal site evaluation committee or better defining alternative site analysis in rsa lba amended sb fiscal note as amended by the senate amendment s methodology this bill adds duties to the solid waste working group established under rsa and is not expected to impact state county and local revenue or expenditures agencies contacted none
